◆ ADC_ConvertVoltage()

static float_t ADC_ConvertVoltage ( uint16_t  adcCounts)
static

converts reading from ADC to a voltage in mV.

Parameters
adcCountsdigital value read by ADC
Returns
voltage in mV

For details to equation see Equation 28 in Technical Reference Manual SPNU563A - March 2018 page 852

◆ adc_conversionState

ADC_STATE_e adc_conversionState = ADC_START_CONVERSION
static

describes the current state of the conversion

This variable is used as a state-variable for switching through the steps of a conversion.
